Rouge offers to get someone else to experiment on
1.content:
Tails was in his kitchen eating lunch. He had been working non-stop and decided to take a break. "Man, I must have twice as many inventions then I had last week!" He said to himself as he ate his sandwich. "I don't know if I'll ever get to test them all. I got lucky with Rouge wanting my chaos emerald last time, but I doubt she'd be willing to do it again."

Just then there was a loud banging at his door. "Who could that be?" He opened the door and there stood Rouge with a very ticked look on her face. "Rouge? What are you..." "Don't give me that!" She cut in. "You know why I'm here!"

She held the chaos emerald he had given her in front of his face. The one that said "Made in China". "Oh. That." Said Tails nervously. "Well the deal was I would give you a chaos emerald if you tested my inventions. I never said it would be a real one."

"Why you little sneak!" Her temper was fuming. "Let's see how you like being someone's guinea pig!" She grabbed him by the scruff of his neck and dragged him towards his lab. "Wait!" He said. "I still have some inventions I haven't tried yet! If you let me try them on you, then I swear I'll give you two chaos emeralds this time! Real ones!"
1.title: Here we go again

11.content: "Oh no." She said. "I'm going to teach you a lesson on what happens when you trick a master thief!" He tried to get away but her grip was too strong. "Now, what would best teach you a lesson?" She said looking around at his inventions.

1111.content:
Rouge picked up Tail's size ray, not realizing that it was set on grow. "Let's see what this one does." She says evily. Tails tries to run away, but Rouge pulls the trigger, firing a green beam at him.

The beam hit him, then suddenly, he began growing at an alarming rate. Everything around him was getting smaller. Suddenly, he bumbed his head on the ceiling of his lab.

"Ow!" He said. He looked down at Rouge, who now realized her mistake. Tails grinned. He reached down to grab her.

She tried to run, but his hand closed around her. He lifted his fist up to his face. "Tails! Put me down now!" She demanded from inside his fist. Tails squeezed his fist tight. Rouge yelled, fearing being crushed.

"It seems to me that your not in a position to be making demands." Said Tails. "Now, I'm going to teach YOU a lesson." He pondered what to do with her.
1111.title: Fee Fye Foe, You know the rest

Tails then stared with an evil grin at Rouge,which made Rouge shake in fear once more. He took her out of the scanner,and asked her one question before she became his meal: "Any last words,Rouge?" Rouge began praying that he doesn't do this,but her praying failed. Tails put her in his mouth,and closed it shut. Darkness. Pure darkness around in there,with little to no light. With Tails under her arm, and Thorn over her shoulder, Rouge flew back to Tails' lab. It was a bit of a struggle, carrying a baby and an adult. Her wings were getting tired from the strain. "Good thing she's about to get a lot lighter." She thought.

When she got to the lab, she laid Thorn, who was starting to stir, down in the machine. She quickly put in the commands on the console and started the machine. Just as the machine activated, Thorn woke up. "Hey, what" But she was cut off by the machine whirring.

When the machine opened, there sat a purple baby hedgehog girl. Rouge went to pick up Thorn, but then she noticed that the lab door was open! Someone saw her!

There, standing in the doorway was Sonic! He had come looking for Tails, and seen her turn thorn into a baby! He also saw Tails sitting at Rouge's feet, and instantly knew what was going on.

"You!" He said. "So, your kidnapping people and turning them into babies! You'll never get away with this!"

Rouge grinned, cocking the gun while Tails' feminine face changed from sour to horrified.

She struggled to get up lazily, clutching her forehead as if she had an intense headache. Rouge smirked triumphantly, glad tosee Tails in such inner turmoil. She walked over to the newly feminine genius, wondering what in the world the results would be.

Suddenly, Tails shot up from the floor and dashed over to his control panel and began working frantically. Rouge gaze inquisitively at what he was working on on, to see a world map displayed, along with a bunch of code being inputted. Tails mumbled "ahhh... where are you..."

"THERE you are!" said Tails, and with a maniacal laugh, ran out the door in the dot's general direction.

Tails didn't quite know what to say to the beautiful orange-red vixen that currently held her in a tight embrace, so she blushed heavily and stared at her instead.

"Oh, my darling, I've missed you so much." Fiona said, as she squeezed Tails tighter, pushing the smaller vixen's face into her cleavage in the process.

"Fiona?" Sonic asked. "Are you feeling alright?"

"Why wouldn't I be? I've got my sexy little girl right here in my arms." Fiona giggled, a love-struck smile on her face. It occurred to Sonic that Tails had been trying to subject him to the same fate that had befallen Fiona, and as a result, he wasn't sure if he wanted to help Tails. Especially since Tails had technically always wanted Fiona, at least until his gender changed.

However, Fiona noticed that Tails was struggling against her, and she loosened her grip and looked Tails in the eye.

"Tails, baby, is something bothering you?" She asked.

"Yes. You see, Fiona, I'm straight, and I love Sonic. You don't even love me, you just got blasted with my Love Ray." Tails admitted.

Tails P.O.V

The blast from the ray felt like getting hit by a car, except less painful and no broken bones. Right away Tails had the worst headache she had ever felt. She fell to her knees, clutching her head in pain. Luckily, Tails had seen the setting, and knew Rouge wanted to see her chase Sonic. Her personality was rapidly slipping away, and she had one shot to save herself. "Not Sonic, not Sonic, not... not...... Oh yeah, not Sonic. He's my friend. I'm madly in love with Knuckluvs!" She thought. She inserted a strand of Knuckles hair that was from earlier into a machine, and got his location. "I'm coming, Knuckluvs!" She yelled, and dashed out of the room.

Knuckles was taking a relaxing walk through the woods. Just himself and the gentle chirping of birds. His anger managment instructer had recommended it, and you know what? He was enjoying it. He let out a long breath, and it became a floating fog. "This is the life..." He sighed. "Knuckluvs!!" A voice screamed, suddenly breaking the calm in the woods. Knuckles looked behind him, and suddenly got tackled. "Hey! Get off!" Knuckles yelled struggling to get the vixen off his back. She hopped off, and helped him up. "Sorry, I kind of got carried away..." She apologized, realizing how crazy she was acting. "Yeah, well, don't do it again." Knuckles retorted, brushing himself off. He finally looked up and saw who had attacked him. He was very turned on, especially because she was naked. "Uh.. um.. Shouldn't you have some clothes on?" Knuckles asked. "Shouldn't you?" She asked sexily, walking up to Knuckles. She lifted up his chin from looking at her boobs so that he was looking into her eyes. She slid her fingers down his chest. "Nice abs..."
"I... I think I should go." Knuckles said, and started walking away. "See ya around, Knuckluvs." Tails said, wiggling her fingers at him. She giggled and flew back to her house. "I watched the whole thing on an invention, and I know Knuckles likes you." Rouge said.

113212.content:
Rouge walked up to the home the couple shared, beyond satisfied with her handiwork.

Tails had much less renown than her famous husband, she was something of a wallflower in her past life. Because of that, the only people that really had to be convinced that this was normal was their limited social circle. For the larger world, all she needed to do was change a few records, and like that, any trace of Tails was gone.

Millie, despite her girlier mindset, was still every bit the heroic partner to Sonic she was in her past life, and that was the key to her romance with him. The free-spirited hedgehog had never wanted to be tied down, always adventuring, and Millie had always been by his side. His comrade, his partner, his equal. And that was what he came to love about her. She was the perfect girlfriend for him. Not a fangirl chasing behind him, a Princess tied to a specific location, or a pop-star who wasn't cut out for fighting.

Their love grew and grew, and soon the famous Hero of Mobius had an image change. Not the lone champion, but one half of a heroic couple, boyfriend and girlfriend, husband and wife, Mr. and Mrs. Sonic the Hedgehog (Though Millie still kept her last name, calling herself "Hedgehog" didn't make sense).

And, when the villains were gone... Sonic finally settled. They still travelled a lot, but he loved his wife enough to slow down for her, at least while she had his children.


It was this wonderful, idyllic love-life between the two that Rouge ventured into that day, finding Millie sitting in a shaded swing-seat, one hand holding a book, the other massaging her swollen belly.

"Hello, Millie." She greeted.

"Hmmm... What to do, what to do..." Rouge contemplated as she looked over the controls.

Suddenly, she had it. She knew what to do now.

Hitting some buttons on the panel, Rouge confirmed the transformation.

"Oh no..." The two-tailed captive said, choking on the pink gas that was filling the walls of the machine he was trapped in.

Tails grunted as he felt his body slenderising, his fur turning pink in the process. He bit his lip as his arms and belly lost all their hair, becoming smooth and feminine. His face changed too, his ears shrinking as his eyes turned from blue to green, growing long female eyelashes in the process. Tails, having realised he was turning into one of his female friends, tightened his fists, bracing himself for the gender change. His male organs retreated into his body as breasts pushed out on his chest, his entire insides rearranging themselves to fit for the new female body he was now inhabiting.

Before long, Tails fainted from the tremendous strain of the massive change his body had underwent.

Noticing the gas dispersing from the machine, Rouge decided to take a look in, only to see a naked Amy Rose lying on the floor, wearing Tails' gloves and shoes.

"Oh my. It's certainly worked better than I thought it would. But has his mind changed?"

choices: He is a total dragon now
114321.content:
Rouge pressed a random button on the control panel, and Tails immedietley began to change. His fur turned to scales. His two tails fused into one. Black horns sprouted from his head. Spiked emerged from his back. His muzzle grew outwards, his teeth grew into fangs His body became long and flexible, growing much larger than he was before.

Finally, two enormous wings grew from his back, causing the machine to burst open. There stood Tails as a huge orange dragon. (Who will now be referred to as Drails.) Rouge, realizing her mistake, tried to run.

She made it outside, and there didn't seem to be any sign of him chasing her. Suddenly, Drails burst up through the ground, and roared.

Rouge tried to fly away, but Drails flew after her. Rouge flapped furiously, trying to get away, but Drails was right behind her. She did several barrel rolls and dodges, as Drails launched multiple fireballs at her, singeing her fur and wings.

Finally, Drails' jaws clamped down on her. The last thing she saw before everything went dark was teeth closing down in front of her, and the reek of brimstone. Drails swallowed her whole, forcing her down his throat and into his stomach.

Now that Tails is a dragon, is he still himself? Does he still know who he is, and was just chasing Rouge to get back at her? Or, does have no memory of who he was and is now a midless beast? Will he maybe go on a rampage?
114321.title: Drails

choices: made a deal to spare rouges life
scare the crap out of rouge
1143211.content: which tails looked down at rouge and said "well now seems the tables have turned rouge" which rouge gulpped cause she was now in trouble which tails...
1143211.title: He still has his mind

11432112.content:
Rouge felt Drails' stomach rumble, and it began to fill with bile. "That would be my stomach preparing to digest you." Said Drails as he came to the ground to land. Rouge gagged at the stink of his guts' fluids. "Tails Please!" Rouge begged. "Let me out!"

Tails laid down on his side, feeling Rouge shift around inside him. "Why should I? This is what you get for trying to use my own machines on me!"

Rouge was up to her knees now in stomach fluid. "I'm sorry!" She pleaded. "Please! I'll never try to steal from you again! I'll do anything! Just let me out!" She began pushing against his stomach walls, trying to force her way out.

"Hmmmm. Anything?" Said Tails, pondering if he should take her offer.
11432112.title: scare the crap out of rouge

choices: It works! Rouge goes flying out of Drails' mouth
114321122.content:
"Nope! This is what you get for letting your greed get the best of you." Drails closed his eyes and drifted off to sleep to digest his meal better. Drails' stomach acid had already eaten through Rouge's boots and part of her pants. She could feel her skin burning from the acid. She was up to her waste now in it.

"This is it." She thought. "My only hope is to get him to regurgitate me somehow." She shuddered a the thought of that. But it was her only way of escape. She didn't even want to try to get out "the back way".

Then she remembered, she had a pack of mentos in her pocket! She could through them into the fluid, and hopefully the carbonation would cause him to burp her up!

She pulled out the mentos and prayed that her plan would work.

1143222222222222222222222221.content:
Tails' body began shifting. His head stayed the same, but his grew a mane of fur around his neck. He got down on all fours as his legs changed shape. He grew claws and fangs. His body became longer and more muscular.

He now had the head of a fox, and the body of a lion. When the machine doors opened, he ran out and pounced on Rouge, pinning her to the floor. He sat on top of her, staring down at her.

"Big mistake Rouge." He said in a menacing voice. "Now, I'm going to eat you." He opened his mouth wide, showing his fangs, and he prepared to bite down on Rouge's head.

"Wait!" Cried Rouge. "Give me a chance!" Tails grinned. Now that he was a sphinx, he loved to play with his victims. "Very well, I will ask you three questions. If you get any wrong, your my food." Rouge didn't have a choice, so she agreed.

"What is your name?" Tails asked. This was too easy! "Rouge." She said.

"What is your shoe size?"

"12."

Tails' final question was......

Rouge and Tails
Rouge was curious. How big could she make his large mounds. Then she thought, "I could make them grow forever but that's not fun" So she decided to make Tails not grow too big. Tails was scared. He didn't know how far Rouge would take this as he felt his chest become heavier and heavier. He watched the mounds project out then down. The mounds started slowly lowering and growing fatter. He didn't like this but he didn't hate it either.
Rouge wasn't satisfied with normal sizes. She wanted his new mounds to be huge but she wanted him to still be able to move. She watched the mounds go past F and saw them become half the size of Tails. She clicked a button that said "Stop this adjustment" and she watched the mounds stop and jiggle.
Tails was relieved the Rouge wasn't out to destroy him and saw his new endowments jiggle. They were heavy but Tails was granted with a new back strength. He was still able to hold himself up and was now starting to like his new endowments.

115311.content:
Although Rouge had some skill at breaking into secure computer databases, she was by no means a programming expert. Thus she initially panicked when she activated the machine and the screen brought up a prompt that would allow her to custom tailor the roboticization process. Just by looking at it, Rouge could tell that manipulating anything on it was beyond her skill. Fortunately, there was a button labeled 'INITIATE DEFAULT CONVERSION' on the control panel. Relieved at being presented with an easy option, Rouge opted to simply press this, rather than attempt to divine the, frankly byzantine, customization program.As soon as she pressed the button, the machine began to emit a blinding light. When it was finished, the transparent conversion pod lifted to reveal Tails' new, robotic form.

In a word he was... cute. He looked largely the same as before, small and slightly toylike, except that instead of fur, he was covered head to foot in orange and white painted metal. His limbs, tails, neck, and midsection had been replaced with jointed, highly flexible replicas. Finally, his eyes had become two blank screens. Suddenly two brightly glowing circles, exactly the same shade of blue that his originals had been appeared on them, signifying that he had completed the power up sequence.

Tails stepped forward, out of the roboticization chamber, and turned to face Rouge. "Yes!" Rouge exclaimed. "It worked! Tails is now my robotic slave!" "Not exactly," Tails replied. His voice was much the same as his original, albeit with a small electronic overtone, and his eyes seemed to glow brighter when he spoke. While on a more obviously threatening robot, such as metal sonic, the affect would have been intimidating, on Tails, who's features were rounded and soft, rather than sharp and angular, it was more endearing than creepy. "What!?" Rouge shouted. "But Robotnik designed those pods to enslave anyone who was roboticized!"

"Which is why mine was not an exact duplicate!" Tails replied, anger beginning to suffuse his voice. "When I reverse engineered it, I deliberately removed the device's ability to immediately enslave, and made it overwhelmingly difficult to modify the procedure from default parameters! You didn't think the customization tool was that mind bogglingly complex by accident did you?" he explains as he walks toward Rouge, his new metallic form managing to exude an aura of calculated precision and efficiency, despite how cute it looked.

Rouge attempted to run, but Tails was too fast for her. He easily caught up with, and captured her. Although she struggled to escape his grasp, his robotic limbs, though fragile looking, where unbelievably strong. Tails lifted Rouge up and she started panicking. "What are you going to do?" she asks, frightened.

1153221222.content:
A few months later, Rouge came to Tails' house to gloat, and to see how his pregnancy was going. She had brought her camera, hoping to get a picture of him, maybe post it on the internet.


"Hey Foxy!" She called as she walked through the day. "Sonic says he hasn't seen you in months! Too embarrassed to show yourself?" No answer. Rouge figured he heard her, but wouldn't talk to her.


"Well, this is what you get for double crossing me." She said as she went down into Tails' lab. But as she entered the lab, everything went black, and she saw stars as she was suddenly knocked out.


Tails had been standing next to the lab door. He had hit rouge in the head with a mallet as she entered. He smiled evilly. "And this is what you get for using my own machines on me." He dragged Rouge across the floor and strapped her into a chair.


Rouge began to wake up, still dizzy. "What the!?" She said when she realized what had happened. She was sitting next to a large machine with a long tube coming out of it. "Tails, where are you!?" She shouted angrily.


Tails stepped out from behind the machine, grinning. His belly was now the size of a basketball, and stuck out a good foot from his body. "Hello, Rouge." He said. "I thought you might come back to rub this in my face." He said pointing to his now rounded belly.
"So I made this machine especially for you."


He took the tube coming from the machine and shoved it in Rouge's mouth. The tube had straps on its sides, which Tails buckled around her head, so she couldn't spit the tube out.


"Mmmmmmmhhhhhhh!" Rouge protested. Tails went over to the machine controls, inputting commands. "You the one good thing about this belly of mine?" He said as he typed. "After this kid is born, my body will be back to normal." He smirked. "I can't say the same thing for you, though."


Rouge gave a muffled "What do you mean?"


"I'm going to take something important to you away." Said Tails. "something even more valuable than jewels. Your figure." He pressed the start button, and a white liquid flowed from the machine, through the tube, in rouge's mouth. It tasted somewhat like cream.


Rouge struggled against her bonds, but to no avail. Then, her body started to get bigger. Her belly grew to match Tails', then even bigger than that. Her arms and legs thickened, making them look like overstuffed sausages. Her breasts welled to the size of beach balls. Her body suit began to rip, revealing her growing flesh. Her heart plate strained against her billowing breasts until it snapped and flew off.


Tails grinned as he watched. The fluid was a special weight gain formula he had created for just this. It would continue to fatten Rouge until her stopped the machine. How big should he make her?"

1153321221222.content:
"Oh, man! I can't take much more of this!" said Tails, shutting his eyes tightly. "I think I'm going to-" *POP* Tails' body suddenly explodes with great force.

Meanwhile, in his lab: "Now where did Tails put those emeralds..." Rouge muttered to herself. Suddenly there was a loud noise, accompanied by a tremendous shock-wave that knocked Rouge flat on her back. "What was the THAT?! Was that Tails?!"

Back with Tails: Tails opened his eyes. He was surprised that he was still alive, and tried to look around. What he saw made him wish that he hadn't. He was just a disembodied head, plummeting towards Mobius. He looked around, and saw that other parts of his body were falling with him, though most were already far away. Suddenly he realized that he could still feel his parts, and remembered that immortality was the original intended purpose of the virus that Rouge had infected him with. He looked down to see the ground rushing up to meet him. Immortal or not, that was going to be a painful reunion. In the last second or two before he hit the ground, he saw that his head was falling right back into the laboratory he had just come from. Then everything went dark.

"Tails, Tails," he heard a voice calling to him. He opened his eyes. "Y-Yeah?" W-What is it?" "Oh thank goodness you're alright, I'd hate to have a murder on my hands. It's me, Rouge, remember." "Oh hi Rouge. Sorry I'm so disorientated right now. I'm not all together at the moment..." he chuckled feebly. Rouge groaned at the pun. "I can see that. How did that happen anyway? I mean, no offense, but, shouldn't you be, ya know, dead?"

Tails explained to her about the virus, and how it was originally designed to make people immortal, and how the inflation and eventual explosion were unintended side-effects. "I think my parts should just reattach if they're put back in their proper places, but they're all over the world now, and I'm in no fit state to go find them by myself. So will you help me pull myself together?"

Rouge thought about it.

He leaned over, kissing her cheek as he gave an almost wicked smirk. "Hey, think of it this way... I'm gonna keep my promise to you this time. You'll get exactly what's promised to you. Heck, you'll even get to own this lab... Shame that I'm going to disappear, but thanks for continuing my work while I'm gone."

She looked confused, spitting at him. "Why the hell would I ever do that?"

Before she could scream at the top of her lungs, he pressed the rest of the way into her, her body going into convulsions as he sank in. Eventually Rouge came across an elaborate watch with several settings.

"What is this?" Rouge asked.

"It's nothing," Tails responded. "It's just an ordinary watch."

"You're lying," Rouge said. "Tell me what it really is, or you will regret it."

Not wanting to find out what Rouge would do, Tails decided it wasn't worth lying to her.

"Alright, it's a time machine. You just put it on, put in the date, and hit the 'Go' button. Easy enough."

Rouge smirked as she fastened the watch onto her arm.

"Now let's see what happens when I travel to the past and change your past!"

Rouge activated the device before Tails could stop her. A blinding light filled the room, then Rouge was gone.

1212.content:
Tails aimed his size ray at Rouge and pulled the trigger. Rouge yelped as a green beam of energy hit her. Her body began to increase in size. Her clothes became tight at first, but they soon started growing with her. She grew to the size of a football field before she stopped. She had to bend down to see Tails now. He stared up into the two enormous aqua eyes staring at him.

"What did you do?" She asked. He held up the ray gun. "My size ray." He said. "It lets me grow or shrink anything I want." An evil plan formed in Rouge's mind. She picked the ray gun out of Tails' hand between her fingers, and crushed it. "Hey!" Shouted Tails. "Sorry. But I couldn't have you using that to stop me. With my new size, I can become the new queen of this planet! But first........."

She picked Tails up and held him up to her face. She licked her lips, and opened her mouth wide. "No! Stop! Wait!" Shouted Tails, but she didn't listen. She threw him in her mouth and slammed her mouth shut. Tails tried to get up, but slipped on her wet tongue. She leaned her head back and swallowed, forcing him down her throat. He fell down her throat and landed with a "Oof!" In her stomach.

He leaned against the wall of her stomach, and racked his brain for a plan. "I need to get out of here before I get digested! Or worse, Rouge takes over the world!"
1212.title: A very BIG Mistake

choices: Wait for her to go to sleep, then crawl out her mouth.
12121.content:
"First stop, Acorn Castle!" Said Rouge, as she punched a hole in the lab ceiling and flew out. Meanwhile, Sally Acorn was in her tower room, applying her makeup. She heard a loud soaring sound coming from outside. "Can't they get those flight paths changed already?" She said, annoyed.

Suddenly, there was a loud thud, and the entire palace shook. Sally yelped as she tried to grab onto something for support. Then the entire room of her tower was torn off, and there staring down at her was Rouge. "Well, well, Sally." She said grinning. "Rouge!? What happened to you?" Gasped Sally.

"I had a little growth spurt." Said Rouge. "Now, you will surrender your position as queen to me, or else you'll be joining your friend, Tails." She patted her stomach as she said this. "You ate Tails!?" Said Sally, horrified. "Yep, and he was tasty. I wonder what you'll taste like?"

Rouge picked up sally between her fingers and held her over her open mouth. "No! Wait! You win! Mobius is yours." Sally said, defeated.

And so, Rouge was now queen. She forced the people of Mobius into being her servants, then she commanded her new slaves to begin construction of a massive palace for her new size.

All the while, Tails was still in Rouge's gut, trying to think of a way out. "Who knows what Rouge will do to the world." He said to himself. Suddenly, he heard the sound of someone yelling, and it was getting louder and louder. Someone else was coming down to join him! That someone was Sonic, who landed with a loud plop.

"Sonic!" Said Tails, happy to see his friend. "Tails! I'm glad your okay." Said Sonic, relieved that his little buddy was still alive. "We won't be okay if we don't think of a way out of here, and fast. What has Rouge done so far?"

Sonic told Tails how Rouge has made slaves of the everyone, and how she had eaten him for trying to stop her. "Well, we need to figure out how to get out of here, and stop Rouge. But how?"
