12221.content:
Rouge stepped into the chamber and turned facing the door as it closed. Tails gets to work on the keyboard, typing away, keying in commands, etc. He got near the end of the startup sequence before the interface showed 'Age Regression: _ _ years of age'.

"Well Rouge is usually one to mock me on my size, so I should knock her down a couple of pegs", mused Tails.

After the keystrokes of the zero and eight key, the machine hums and shakes in place, reverting its test subject to a simpler time. With a rather cartoonish ding, the door opens, release light smoke and stream across the room. Tails takes a look into the chamber to see the result the machine had.

Rouge was standing still with her eyes closed. Her eyeliner, mascara, and lipstick had disappeared, leaving her face without any makeup. It was obvious that she was smaller than before, unmistakably a child. Still she managed to be taller than Tails is now, but it might be loss noticeable if she wasn't still in her boots. Speaking of which, those boots, her gloves, and breastplate were too big to fit her, but fabric underneath it seemed snug around her. Might make sense to wear form-fitting clothing if you're a thief.

Rouge slowly flutters her eyes open as they adjust to the fog. She tries to step forward but since her knees were inside the the long boots, she stumbles forward and rolls right out of them. Offering a hand, Tails lifts her to her feet. Upon another inspection, no matter if from the top of their heads or their upright ears, the both of them are the same height. Rouge then quickly pushes Tails away, causing him to fall to the ground. When he looks up at her she stares back at him before saying...
12221.title: Rouge the Kid

choices: I need you to get clothes for me. I can't go out like this.
I need to a place to stay for the night. It's getting dark.
122212.content:
"Rouge, it's okay. It's just me, Tails. You're just..." Tails stated before being cut off.

"Look kid, I don't know who you are, but you better have a good reason as to why I'm here."

Tails was a little surprise to hear that Rouge had forgotten about him. It wasn't as if she truly got amnesia, though. It was a guess, but Tails hypothesized that Rouge's memories and personality reverted back to what they were when she was eight as well. He figured the first time he saw her was around the same time Shadow and Space Colony ARK appeared, which ultimately was not long ago. Changing her back about ten years would make her not remember who he is. Heck she wouldn't remember anyone.

"Well,you see..." Tails said while rattling his head for a excuse good enough not to get his face kick in. "Ah! That's right. I found sleeping outside a few hours ago. I would have left you there if I didn't think a bad man named Eggman would have taken that chance to use you as a robot's battery." For a lie thought up on the spot, it really did capture her attention, plus it was something Eggman probably would have done.

"Eggman? Sounds like something you would eat for breakfast? Aw well, let me tell you something, Foxy. If that punk ever tries to pull something, I'll kick him so hard, he's gonna need ice for weeks." Rouge boasted.

'She's already good at kicking people at eight years old? Just who is this girl.' wondered Tails.

"By the way," she said rather stiffly, "what is with this outfit?" She points towards the empty breast plate that threatens to sag the entire attire to the ground.

Blood rushed through Tails cheeks as his face breaks out into a blush."Well, when I found you, you were mostly...um...n-naked" Rouge's mouth started to growl after hearing this, frightening Tails into a panic. "But, you see...I couldn't leave you like that! So I tried throwing some clothes on you. It just turned out that they were too big. Do you get it now? It's actually kind of funny. Haha ha! Ha."

With a swift motion, Rouge kicked her toes into Tails' gut. The pain that caused him to double over was being smothered only by the fact that he knew she was holding back. "I knew you were a freak, I guess those big tails weren't for show."

If there was something Tails hated more then people mocking his height it was people mocking his twin tails. He quickly got up and began to yell at the brat before it just started a session of the two just spatting insults at each other that resolved nothing. Finally, Rouge stormed out of the lab, holding up the plate to keep it from bouncing around.

Tails was upset about what just happened, but when he finally cooled down he knew he it wasn't right to leave kid Rouge to the world. Tails spoke aloud to himself "Man, I guess I screwed up, huh? I need to get her back here before anyone sees her, especially Eggman. Mmmm...she's probably not a jewel thief so she might not try to stay hidden. Maybe a survey bot..."

Then the door slammed open as Rouge returned. She was obviously still in a foul mood, looking at the fox."Umm..."

"Tails, the name's Miles Prower, but call me Tails" he said getting the hint.

"Right, so Tails, turns out I need a favor."

"What?" Tails curiosity peaked.

"I can't quite leave yet."

"Why?"
122212.title: Bratty Bat

1222121.content:
"Huh?!" Tails gasped in surprise.

"Don't 'huh' me! You can't expect me to walk around in this getup?" She spat at him.

"Well I don't think would be to much trouble if you would..." he couldn't finish that thought before sensing Rouge's presence growing more violent around her. With his mouth slightly opened and a twitch in his eye, he quickly folded. "Right, off to get some clothes..."

--One hour Later--

The two stood in the middle of a shopping mall, staring down a clothing store for girls. Girly girls.

"Tails, you can't be serious. I would look absolutely ridiculous if we shop here." Rouge complained.

"Ridiculous? You're the one using my tails to cover herself." Tails pointed out. True enough, Rouge blanketed herself in between his golden furred tails. Quickly removing them, she stood nearly naked with only the fabric of her former suit on her, minus the breastplate.

"Still, I'm not girly. I never have been. Wait, you're a genius or something, right? Can't you just take some bigger that I would like and shrink them to fit me?" She questioned.

"I'm an engineer. If it doesn't have any tricks like hovering over water I don't think I would make one hundred percent." Judging by the look in her eye, he guessed she stopped paying attention after the 'walking on water' thing. Wait, can't she fly? "Anyway, if you really don't want the be 'naked', then you should really get something while we're here."

"There is no way I'm doing this."

"Ugff" Tails scoffed in detest to Rouge's behavior.

"Fine, looks like I'm getting nowhere here." With that, Rouge left Tails behind leaving a trail of people gasping at her sudden rudeness.

Tails just watched as the batgirl disappear among the crowd. Finding an empty bench, he sat down and began thinking about what he was going to do. Obviously Rouge tolerated him up to this point because he could help her, but now she doesn't want it anymore. Then he thought about the promise he made with her to test his machine. He had hope that if she didn't remember, he wouldn't have to give her two Chaos Emeralds. Now he was thinking if he had rode along with this for too long.

He felt a tap on his shoulder in the middle of his pondering. Before him was Rouge in a new completed outfit. Over the black fabric was a white gilet vest with the edges being pink. She was also wearing a pair of khaki shorts that seemed loose if it was not for the belt with a heart shaped buckle. Apparently she still had her taste in boots as she wore a white pair similar to her old ones that went high enough to allow a few inches between them and her shorts. The plain part about the outfit was the traditional white gloves that almost everyone has, but her left wrist held a bracelet with a moon-star pattern. Tails couldn't lie to himself, she picked out a great wardrobe.

"I'd like to see you try to find this in that shop." Rouge boasted.

"Woah! How did you find clothes to fit you?" Tails said with amaze.

"Apparently there are stores here for all styles and all ages. Turns out this genius didn't look hard enough."

Tails slapped his forehead in light of his mistake. Then a realization popped into his head. "Wait a minute, how did you pay for those if I wasn't with you?"

"Oh, I just took them. Do you seriously think they would force the sweet, innocent girl to take her clothes off?"

"Point taken, but if you ran off without me, why did you come back?"

"You see..."

Before he heard her excuse, she looked to the person standing behind him. When Tails turned to see them, his heart slightly sank. What if they put two and two together and realize the Rouge got younger? Now he had to deal with...
1222121.title: To the Mall!

12221211.content:
The pink hedgehog was standing still, looking directly at the young bat. She wasn't certain, but this girl seemed awfully familiar to her.

"Tails...", Amy started, "who's your friend here? She kind of reminds me of someone."

He quickly placed his hand across her mouth in an attempt to stop her talking. He raises his other hand to her ear and whispers, "Amy, don't freak out, but that's Rouge. She tested one of my new machines, and now she is eight years old."

"What?" she practically squealed in a hush voice. "Well why she's here? Why did you bring her to the mall?"

"I...I sorta...can't tell you why." he uttered not wanting to bring up the clothes incident. "There is another thing. She can't remember anything past the point she was eight."

"So let me get this straight: she is now eight which is also your age, she doesn't remember us, you're both together at the mall, and you're too shy to tell me anything else." she summarized. "It sounds a bit like a date if you ask me." she teased with a sly smile.

Tails' white cheeks tinted red after hearing this. "No, it's not like that."

"Hello..." Rouge's voice piped up, catching Amy and Tails off-guard. "You can't pretend that I'm not here."

Amy was the first to apologize and 're'introduce herself to the kid. Rouge's impression towards the adult in the group was not the best, still being peeved about being ignored. She was a bit of a rebel to Amy, not going to in depth when answering her questions or straight up refusing. She was getting irritated to the point she had her hammer behind her back. Even though he was nervously looking directly at her, Tails had no clue where it came from. The conversation was going south until the focus was set to Tails himself.

"So..." Amy starts gripping the hammer tightly, "If you don't mind me asking, why exactly are you here with Tails?"

Rouge places her hands her hips and look in his direction. "Because he's taking care of me. He told me about some evil 'Eggdude' and now he wants to play hero."

Amy froze. "You mean Eggman, right?"

"Whatever his name is."

"Okay, can you excuse again for a second." She grabs Tails to speak privately again. "Okay mister" she hisses, "you're going to have to fix this. If Eggman was to get her, she probably wouldn't be able to fight back as she used to."

"Actually, I think she might be fine." He waves his hands in front of his face.

"How can you be so optimistic about this?!"

"You know how she used to thief? Well everything she has right now is stolen." He points behind her. Of course the only thing of interest of Rouge. Amy scanned the clothes she was wearing to catching his drift, but what really sealed the deal was that she was holding Amy's Piko Piko Hammer behind her back, not really trying to hide it.

"Hey! Give that back!" she screamed, snatching it back.

"Sorry, what can I say, it looked so cool I wanted to see it for myself." Rouge smirked.

"Yep, that's the real Rouge alright." Tails deadpanned.

"Anyway," she returns to a whisper, "this still seems pretty weird. Do you think you turn her back to normal?"

"It's possible..."

"Then do it! Sorry to crush what little fantasy this is, but you know what you have to do."

Tails knew that Amy was right, but to a point, he didn't want to turn her back, at least not yet.

Suddenly, a sharp pain hits Tails as Rouge pulls his ear to engage into their own private conservation. "If she's giving trouble, I know what we should do."

Tails asked, "We...?"

"You're being too soft, kid. Toying with her is fun, so we should prank her. Then she'd know not to look down on you." she smiled.

"Prank her? I don't know..."

"Come on, what's the worst that could happen?" It grew silent as Tails was reflecting on the last 'prank' he pulled. "It doesn't have to be anything big."

"Well...I do have other machines I wanted to test out. Hopefully these ones don't affect memory." he mused.

"That's the ticket. Wait, what was that about..."

"Nothing!...Nothing..."

"I'd love to see what you would do, but the choice is yours. Are you going to do it or not?"
12221211.title: The Pink Hedgehog

122212111.content:
"Okay, I'll try something. I can get her to follow us back, but at that point we're gonna have to wing it. "

"Atta boy, fox!" she congratulated him.

"Just follow along, we should be good as soon as we get back." he whispered then turned his attention back to Amy. "Fine, Amy. We going to head back to the workshop." He carefully phased to keep Rouge in the dark. "Let's go."

"Wait, why do I have to go with you?" Amy took suspension in 'we'.

Tails only thought of one word that was good enough, "Closure?"

"Alright. Let's get this done with." Amy accepted without any fight or argument.

Tails thought to himself, "Well that went easier than I expected"

--Back at Tails' Place--

The entire walk back was a bit tense as Rouge glared at at Amy, in return caused Amy to glare at the back of Tails' head. Upon stepping indoors, Amy became overwhelmed by the number of machines. She knew it was one of the best, if not the best, thing Tails can do, but this seemed pretty excessive. "Tails! Are all of these machines new?!" she screamed not being able to compose herself.

He was caught in the middle of thinking of how he would prank Amy. "Huh? Oh, yeah." He scans the room until he saw something that might do the trick. "I started off with this one first, then the rest just worked itself out."

She was too caught up she forgot her reason for coming. She examined the device that Tails grabbed. It wasn't what she expected. In his hand was what looked like a laser gun. "Argh,.. what does it do?"

"Nothing bad, I promise." he pulled the trigger and the resulting laser hit Amy. She stood still before her legs slowly bent and crashed on the floor. "That was a lot easier than I expected."

Rouge was a little shocked, "What did you do?!"

"I said it was nothing bad." he waved his free hand in front of his face. "The laser makes the person it hits fall asleep for an hour. When they wake up, it would be like they slept for eight hours."

Amy slowly stirred while she muttered, "Oh...Sonic...Your running...can't out race...my heart..." The fox and bat just stood still, not sure how to respond.

"See?" Tails said, hoping to end the confusion.

"Well if anything, you bought some time. You better have thought of something good by now."

Tails scratched the back of his head. "Actually, I already thought of a few."

"Then what are you waiting for?"

"Nothing really, i just...curious about something."

Rouge flicked her ears and grinned after she heard him. "This outta be interesting."

"I made some machines that need one test subject, but I also made a few that need more."

"Wait...you expect me to be guinea pig?" she said fuming. Tails stayed silent, thinking of the irony. "Why don't you just test on yourself!" she spat as she held Amy's hammer up high.

"Wha! No no no no!" Tails span his twin tails allowing him to reach to the top of the hammer as he eased it back down. With the fearsome instrument down he breathed a sigh of relief. "Look, at least you would know what would happen, and if something goes wrong, I can fix it better if I am like I am right now."

She glared at the boy, then tilted her head down in contemplation. She rattled with the idea as she tapped the Piko Piko in her hand.

"Can you please drop it already?"

"What exactly would happen?" she questioned.

"Depends, but they usually swap some things around, like switching minds and bodies."

She thinks it over again before looking back at the hedgehog on the ground. She saw her once more before deciding.
122212111.title: Amy the Lab Rat

1222121111.content: (I just putting this up to give other writers a shot. I'll continue on Choice 1, hopefully.)
1222121111.title: Hold up...

choices: "How can I get back at this girl?"
12221211111.content:
"Leave me outta this", Rouge crossed her arms into a 'X'. "This is about her."

"Right...right, sorry." Tails looked down having his to give up on his curiosity for now. "Now we just need to actually do something."

"Yeah, I get the feeling we aren't really doing anything." she grabbed her chin as she browsed the room. "Umm...What about the big one there."

Tails followed her finger and got tense when he saw the aging machine. "Ahh...Why that one?"

"It kinda big so it must be important." She smirked as if she made the most sense in the world.

"Really?"

"Yep. So what does bad boy do anyway?"

"Uhh...It's...an age changer."

After a bit of silence, Rouge smirked, "Perfect." She grabbed one of Amy's arms and began to drag through the doors as Tails only waved his hands in a failed effort to stop her.

Amy continued to muse in her sleep. "Sonic...I knew you'll...take me away...one day."

"Man, she has it rough." Rouge commented as she had Amy sit up in the chamber.

Tails had to raise his voice a bit, "What do you think you're doing?"

"She seemed bossy, so I think it'll be fun to shrink her down to our level."

Tails winced at what she said; it was the same thing he thought to himself when he did it to Rouge.

"Are you ready to teach her a lesson?" Rouge was eager to see the result.

Tails gulped. What if Amy were to get amnesia too? It was too late to try and suggest something else. He decided to go through with it and hope to fix it later.

The genius fired up the machine, set the age to 08 years, and stood back. Everything seemed like it was going fine; it was working just like it did the first time around. Before long, there was the cartoonish ding and the double doors of the chamber opened. The sleeping hedgehog was definitely smaller than when she went in. Her dress sagged as her figure no longer supported it. While it looked like she could manage wearing her gloves and shoes, it was not going to be easy. The only thing to still fit was her hair band as her quills stood out behind her instead of lazing down.

Rouge looked the young girl before facing the boy, "I'm going to wake her up." Before Tails could protest, Rouge was already shaking Amy's shoulder. A few shakes was enough to pop the bubble coming from her nose and wake her. She fluttered her eyes and yawn and found the white bat in front of her. To Rouge's dismay, Amy's ear piecing scream forced her back.

Amy rose to her feet while her whole body fidgeted, "Who are you?!"

"Wait, you don't remember me?" Rouge queried. The only response she got was a fear induced shake of the head. "Ahh...I wanted to rub it in your face, but what's the point if you don't remember?"

Tails was locked in a inner monologue during this, "I first met Amy when she was eight years old, after Sonic saved her from Eggman and Metal Sonic. Is she at the point where she would she know who I am?" As his eyes left the interface, he saw Rouge's eyes shooting daggers at him as if he robbed something from her. "Please don't look at me like that. If you hadn't rushed Amy into..."

"Hey, how do you know my name?"

"Oh boy..!"

Amy moved forward but each step threaten to have her dress slide off. She quickly caught wind of this and held it up with her arms. Unfortunate she didn't tighter clothes like Rouge did. "No, don't look at me..."

Rouge shrugged, "Well aren't you a shy one? Getting a little stared having people look at you."

Tails stood off to the side, "Like you're one to talk." Suddenly, an alarm started going off, startling everyone in the room. Tails immediately recognized it and pulled a small tablet from underneath his workbench. "Why now, why now?"

He turned it on and the screen lit up with a live feed from the Blue Blur himself. "Hey Tails, Eggman is on the move with robot in tow. We need air support, buddy."

"Got it! I'll be there in the Tornado soon." Tails was ready for the face-off until he snapped back into his situation with the young bat and hedgehog. "Aw man. Look I have to go, but neither of you can leave the building." Tails said with authority.

"Screw that," The bat rejected, "Sounds like you need all the help you can get."

"No!" Tails nearly growled, "I know what I'm going to be up against. You are probably going to get in the way. Just stay here until I get back. And you know what? That's an order!" Tails left the room. Within moments, Rouge and Amy had seen through the window the jet plane takeoff off the runway.

"That kid," Rouge muttered, "what makes him think that he can give me an order?"

The pink girl just looked on as the jet disappeared. She didn't say anything but instead was thinking...
12221211111.title: If at first you succeed...

choices: sweetly, "I think you're amazing. Please go out with me!"
with a temper, "How long were you gonna have me wait?"
122212111111.content:
Sparkles flashed in the young girl's eyes as Tails flew off in the Tornado. Her eyes blinked when the jet blurred out of focus. "Whoa..."

Rouge just scoffed at her situation. She was told to stay in a place she barely knew with a prepubescent version of the woman she wanted to tease but can't recall what happened and was one unfortunate move from being completely naked. What really ticked her off though was Tails' command that struck her right in her pride. He seemed submissive and manipulable beforehand. Now the fun was over before it could start. She took another look at Amy who lost in her own little world. It was pretty obvious to her that she had a crush, especially figuring what she said in her sleep. However, her eye was now on someone else.

"You probably don't want to do it." Rouge spoke up, gaining Amy's attention.

"Why? Wait, does he already a girlfriend or..." Amy said innocently before jumping to the conclusion, "Ah! I'm sorry! I didn't know you liked him first!"

The apology deserved a spit-take courtesy of Rouge. "N-no! Don't be stupid! I would never..!"

"Oh...Sorry. So, is he..?" asked the thumb-twiddling girl.

"How the heck should I know? Just trust me on this. This could be bad news."

Amy puffed her cheek at Rouge, showing her mildly angry side. "Well why not? He's fighting Eggman, who the bad guy so he must be a hero or at least a good guy." (I'm assuming she'd know even when she's this young, personally I have no true idea.)

"Why not? Okay. First, do you remember what his name was?" Amy's face froze, seeing how that could be a problem. "Second, you're suddenly in his place and aren't allowed to leave." She placed her index finger over her lips thinking about how bad that was. "Lastly, you're nearly naked." This caused her face in red up under her pink fur.

"I-it just a bunch of misunderstandings, I swear!" Amy pleaded. "Besides, a cool guy like him would never do that."

"Are you sure about that?"

Amy placed her palm on her cheeks and began to drift back into her imagination, "He's so super smart, super reliable, and super handsome. Flying away in his plane to save the day. And he has big puffy tails too. I bet they'll feel like snugly pillows. What a dream boat..."

This was getting too sappy for Rouge's taste, but then she got a wicked idea. Why mess with one person, when she can toy with both of them at the same time. "You're really not going to change your mind huh? Well then, I guess only be fair to let you in on a secret."

Amy snapped back to reality, "Secret? What secret?!" She quickly rose to her feet, which led to the inevitable wardrobe malfunction.

"Okay, first things first, wear some clothes that fit."

--90 minutes later--

The Tornado touched down on the runway without a single scratch on it. Its pilot sighed when he came to a complete stop. He was a little thankful that it was only one of Eggman's ridiculous attacks instead of a serious one. But now he had to resume with another problem.

Amy peeked out the window and tried calm herself down. Rouge leaned into her ear to whisper, "Remember, he's smart but dense. Try being as straightforward as you can." She stepped away and thought to herself, "I can't wait to see his face when she confesses to him."

Tails stood outside the door when he felt that something was off. He slowly opened the door and saw to two girls inside. While Rouge remained exactly the same, Amy was refitted with a green top, orange tutu, and light bluish shoes. (Exactly like in Sonic CD) The truly scary part for Tails was that she held direct eye contact with him.

The love-struck girl took a deep breath and said...
122212111111.title: Once a Fangirl...

122212111112.content:
Amy was in the dark about her current situation. She could not make sense of it all. All that she could gather was that she was abducted by the bat and fox. The girl seemed to have some beef with her and most likely got the boy to tag along. Even after the boy shouted at the bat, she still seemed like the one in control.

Rouge scoffed. Staying cooped up in one spot was not what she wanted to do. Since gloating the hedgehog turned into a failure, her train of thought leaned toward putting her back in the machine and doing something else to mess with her. She had time, but not the knowledge. She was a bit bad, but she'd still feel guilt if something happened.

The pink girl saw the bat girl in a state of anger and tried to seize an opportunity. If she could do something to her, her own escape would be ensured. She slowly rose up grabbing the oversized dress and inched towards a center with many weird instruments. Each one that stuck out to her was confusing; she had no idea what did which thing. She ran her free hand over it and grabbed something at random. What she got was a small remote device with a forked antenna, a green screen, and only one button. There were not any instructions, so she just pointed it at Rouge and pressed the button. Electricity ran across the prongs of the antenna and the screen showed a wavelength of some sort. Other than that, nothing else happened.

Rouge's ear flicked at the crackling of the electricity and turned around. She saw a worried Amy looking at her. "Just what do you think you're doing?"

Having lost her chance to make a break for it, she fell back onto the ground. "Please! I wasn't doing anything, I swear!"

"I guess that means you were." Rouge pointed out the obvious. She approached her with angry malice in her eyes, "I knew you were a pain. I'll just be finished with you before he gets back."

Amy cowered in fear, "Please, don't come any closer! Please!"

She could not see it, but the screen on the remote turned blue. In that instant, Rouge was visibly forced back as if she had hit a brick wall. Despite her efforts, she was physically incapable to move toward Amy. The pink hedgehog looked at the remote that kept emitting a blue screen rather than the original green. As she recalled, her attacker stopped as soon as she told her not to. She commanded it.

She caught a second wind and stood up with the remote pointed at Rouge. "Freeze!" The scene had many similarities to a police officer stopping a criminal.

The bat's arms, legs, and neck all locked in place. Without being able to stabilize herself, she fell face-first to the floor still holding the pose. Rouge's will to stand up was ignored by her entire body. "Shoot! Why can't I move?!"

"Stand up!" With the command, Rouge shot straight up back on her feet. "Jumping jacks!" Her body continued to follow instructions and begin to embarrass her by unwillingly exercising. "Bow!" She leaned forward with her right foot behind her left and her arms swept down to the sides.

"When I get out of this..." She threatened.

'Anything I say, she does. Maybe I grabbed the best thing of all.' Amy thought to herself smiling.

Rouge tried to find a way to free herself. From the corner of her eye she saw something useful, the raygun Tails used to make Amy fall asleep. She hobbled while still bowing and grabbed her lifeline. With a quick flick of the wrist, the hedgehog fell asleep again, dropping the remote in the process. Regaining control, she walked over to retrieve the remote. 'Maybe...I can have my fun after all.'

Amy snoozed off again, but woke up nearly instantly. Rouge saw this and quickly jumped back. "How did you wake up so fast?"

She scratched the back of her head, "Yawn...I-I guess it's because I just woke up...a little while ago." She rubbed her eyes before noticing the remote. "Uh-oh..."

She rose to her feet to try to get the device away from the bat, but Rouge pointed it at her and pressed the button. "Mmm...?Oh I know. Drop the dress!" Amy had no choice as the hand lifting the dress opened. The red garment dropped around her ankles and her face blushed mad. Rouge pressed the button again and said, "Now say 'Rouge is so awesome. She's the best!'"

The screen went from blue back to green. When Amy didn't say anything, Rouge thought, 'Was I not supposed to hit the button again?'

Before she could fix it, the naked hedgehog tackled her. Rouge lost her grip and the remote flew across the room. Both of them saw the remote and raced to it before the other could get their hands on it. There were many times that it slipped out of one of their grasp, but eventually one of them got it, pressed the button, and yelled "Freeze!"

Their victim was frozen and unable to move. The girl to claim the control device was...
122212111112.title: A New Toy to Play With

12221212.content:
The mother-daughter pair of Vanilla and Cream along with their chao friend Cheese were exiting the girly shop right behind Tails when they see him. As expected, they both smile, surprised to see him unexpectedly. Cream in particular walked up in front of him and greeted him politely. It did not take long before she asked the obvious question.

"Excuse me." she bows her head to the bat, "I'm Cream. Who might you be?"

Rouge huffs "Mmph...The squirt really minds her manners. The name's Rouge."

Tails was stunned by how quickly she revealed her name. Seriously, there was no easier to make the connection to the two Rouges than for both of them to have the same name.

Cream had a finger on her mouth looking up, staring off into space, with Cheese mimicking the action. "Hey, Cheese? Haven't we heard that name before?"

"Chao..." he responded dejectedly.

"Well that's fine. It's nice to meet you Miss Rouge."

Tails was dumbfounded about the entire exchange, thinking, "They absolutely forgot about her..."

Vanilla spoke to Rouge in her soft voice, "We don't usually see Tails with kids his age. How did you two meet?"

"I...I was just outside one day and that's just it." she lied as she blushed in embarrassment.

Tails interjected, "Yeah, nothing really out of the ordinary there."

"We just finished shopping and are headed home. Mama, can we invite Miss Rouge over?" asked Cream.

"I don't see why not, but we should tell her parents so they know what's going on."

Rouge expression darkened at the mention of her parents, something that did not go unnoticed by everyone.

"Oh my... Dear, I..." Vanilla apologized.

"...shut it..." Rouge mouthed.

"Rouge..." Tails tried to speak.

"I said shut it!" she yells attracting the attention of everybody in the mall. She starts breathing aloud while avoiding all eye contact. She quickly turn to run away but is stop when Vanilla grabs her right wrist before she could make a single step. She tries to yank her arm free, but it was useless as Vanilla was not flinching. "Stop! Let me go! You don't got anything to do with this!"

A shadow casts over Vanilla's face and her motherly smile was replace with a frown of disapproval. Her presence was cold as the only thing she told the fleeing bat was, "No." Vanilla was so scary, Tails and Cream enveloped into a fear-induced hug with Cheese taking shelter behind them. No matter how hard Rouge pulled, she stayed plant to the ground, allowing only her arm to move. At the lightest hint of Rouge's resistance weakening, she pulls her forward and leads her out the mall. Cream followed her mother while Tails was still confused about what happened.

"Mama, what are you doing?"

Her eyes were revealed again as she looks at her daughter. They weren't passionate, but they also weren't threatening. "It's a mother's job to watch out for their child. So we're going to search for her when we are told more about her." She looks towards the helpless Rouge who has reduced to not moving her legs, allowing herself get dragged as she stares at the ground. "In the meantime, we are going to be the ones to look after her."

Understanding, Creams turn back to Tails and waves goodbye. When they are out of sight, everyone returns to their business. At least now Tails can think clearly again. "Aw man. I don't think I should try to stop them. I hate not knowing what's happening to her, but now I can go back to fix the aging machine. Hopefully she could hold out until then.

--The Rabbit's Residence--

Inside the cottage, the rabbits and bat situated in the living room. Rouge was a grump, still looking down feeling powerless. Vanilla saw the brat sitting on the floor and her daughter looking incredibly worried. "Cream, can you and Cheese go to your room? I want to talk to her alone." They nod and left without a word. She sighs, not quite sure where to begin. "...After all that, I bet you must be hungry?"

"......"

"......"

"...yeah..."

"I'm sorry?" she says, not satisfied with that response.

"......C-can I have something to eat." She tilts her head up but still doesn't look her in the eye.

"Of course, dear." She grabs a small wrapped snack from the cabinet and offers it to her. Rouge eyes it, gently plucks it out of her hand, unwraps it and bites down. "Okay, can you tell anything about what happened between you and your parents?"

Rouge turned her head and took another bite. Vanilla was frustrated until she heard something coming from Rouge. Sniffing? No, it was more like crying. Rouge was not looking away in detest, she was trying to hide tears. Vanilla returned to her former motherly self and shown great concern to the crying child.

"M...*sniff*...Miss R-Rabbit......please..." she begins to plead, wiping her face.

"What is it...?"

"Please...*inhales*..._________________" she yells.
12221212.title: The Rabbits

choices: "She can't go back until it's settled. You have to calm her inner demons."
"This pain will set her down a dark path. Give her the chance at a new life."
122212121.content:
Rouge looked into Vanilla's eyes as she pleaded. The child was on the verge of losing it, but kept her face up to the adult. "I just can't go back there again!"

Vanilla was understandably frightened at the outbursts. She pained to see this suffering coming from the girl. "Sweetie, w-why can't you go?"

Rouge whimpered as she wiped her face with her arm. "If I go back, I'll...be..."

Vanilla quickly placed her hand over Rouge's mouth. She had not heard anything yet and was already mortified. She could tell that she was traumatized by whatever was at the other end of her words. The bat just closed her eyes as tears fell onto Vanilla's glove. She knew Rouge needed comfort, but she could not leave it as it is and ignore it.

Vanilla's eyes were cast in shadow again. Her hands grabbed both sides of Rouge's cheeks and tilted her head up. The bat was shocked to see the rabbit's serious face again. The same one that dragged her out of the mall no matter who saw it.

"Did they hurt you?"

"......"

"Did they threaten you?"

"......"

"If you don't tell me, there's nothing I can do."

"...What can you even do...?"

Her eyes slanted into a glare that stared down anyone to question her logic, "Pardon me, but there's nothing a pissed off mother can't do."

--Tails Workshop - Morning--

Tails was deep in work on the aging machine. He was taking extreme caution in trying to remove the physical memory drive without damaging it. With soldering gun in hand, he focused everything into going for the target. "To think, everything about the jewel thief is inside this computer chip. If I mess up here, she's truly going to be lost." He flipped the switch on the soldering gun to bring it up to heat. "Okay, carefully..."

A loud noise rang across the room, startling the genius. His body jumped in place causing him to panic. After inspecting that nothing was damaged, he went to the source of the noise, a small tablet device that someone was trying to call.

"Tails here."

The screen lit up to show the face of his young rabbit and chao friends. "Hello, Tails." She bowed her head but did not wear her usual cheerful face.

Tails knew something was up. "Is something wrong? Does it have to do with Rouge?"

"Uh-huh. Mama was talking with her and got really mad. She said her parents were mean to her so she's going to do something." Cream and Cheese shared a concerned look. "I haven't seen her like this in a long time."

"Chao chao..."

"Aw man..." Tails sighed. "Wait, what do you mean 'in a long time'?"

Cream's eyes trailed off in remembrance, "Well one time, we had a fake plant on top of our TV. I pretend to take care of it by giving it water, and..."

Tails tried to finish the story quickly, "Spilled it on the TV and broke it?"

Cream was ashamed in herself. "Mama already told me it was fake, so when she found out, she punished me to make sure it wouldn't happen again. She is scary when it came to 'discipline'."

It was more believable to Tails after seeing what happened yesterday. "You said she was going to do something, what was it?"

The kid rabbit balled her fists. "She said she was going to give them a piece of her mind. She also said she might need to talk with the police for help." Cheese grabbed the video phone and showed a different part of the room. "Until then, Miss Rouge is staying here and away from anymore danger." Rouge sat at the dinner table idly smearing one of Cream's crayons onto some paper. She was too bummed out to even look up when her name was spoken.

Tails did not like the initiative Vanilla was taking but understood why. "I guess that's for the best."

......

Tails eyes popped open in sudden realization, "WAIT! That's bad! Really Bad!!" Leaving a questioning Cream on the line, Tails ran out the door. "The memories can wait! Vanilla doesn't know Rouge got younger. Within those ten years, there's no telling what happened. She's going on a wild goose chase...or worse..." Tails shuttered at the thought.

The two-tailed fox made a quick flight to the closest police station to the Rabbit's residence. He tried to see if Vanilla contacted them in anyway. Weirdly enough, she had not. He was confused but then thought that she went ahead without any help. Tails did not know where to go, but he stormed out of there. He began to panic until someone cleared their throat behind him. He turned to see the motherly rabbit apparently waiting for him.

"Vanilla, why did you...?" Tails asked before being hushed.

She spoke in a deeper tone than usual, "Tails," He knew she was going to say something bad. "You're going to have to fix this."

"You know?"

"Now I'm certain. I knew I've seen that girl's face before. The woman with the hearts on her clothes. What did you do?"

"Uhh...?"

"Do you know how much pain she's in right now?..."
122212121.title: Vanilla Takes Charge

122212122.content:
It was sudden and not in any way pleasant. The bat's tears streamed down from her eyes as she progressively went into an all-out bawl. Vanilla gently yet firmly held Rouge against her chest. Rouge at first resisted but gave up, screaming into her fur and skin. It was uncomfortable, but the rabbit knew it would take a moment before she'd calm down.

Ten minutes of expressed pain has passed before the noise died down. The crying reduced to sniffling as Vanilla lightly rubbed young Rouge's head. She placed both of her hand on the sides of her head and looked in her still tearful eyes. "Dear, I'm going to need you to something for me, and for yourself. Don't say another word tonight. Not one......When you finished your snack, we'll have dinner, then go to bed. Unless if you want to go to bed now?" Rouge shook her head in Vanilla's hands. "Okay."

Rouge got up and dragged herself to the dining room table. After being instructed by her mother, Cream came back from her room, trying not to speak the bat but give her warm looks when they made eye contract. After a silent dinner, everyone retired for the night. Because Vanilla didn't want her emotionally stressed guest to sleep on the couch, she shared Cream's bed. The mother took a last look to make sure everything was fine as both kids were in bed before turning off the lights. Cream turned her head towards Rouge, who only met it by looking in the corner of her eye. "Good night, Miss Rouge", was all she said before flipping herself around. Rouge turned over herself and started to drift off while thinking if she should have responded.

--Morning--

After the friendly chao assisted the both of them out of bed, they went to the living room where Vanilla sat, waiting. Cream stuck to her 'new' friend like glue before the topic was resumed.

"So Rouge dear, are you going to be comfortable enough to talk about it?" she didn't answer, looking at the floor. "That's okay. I just need to tell you this." She rose to her feet and took a step forward. "You said that you had nowhere to go. Well, we'll be here for you." This really took her by surprise. Cream and Cheese both gave smiles of full sincerity after hearing the news.

"Why...?" Rouge asked.

"Everyone should have a place where they call..."

"No" She interrupted. "Why...why are you being so nice to me?"

"Why?" Vanilla got to her knees and eye-leveled with her. "There is no other reason than you need it. Everyone needs kindness in this world. You need to both give it and receive it." she hugged her head against her chest again and was joined by Cream and Cheese. "I know it must hurt, but if your don't accept kindness, you'll push away the people that would help you, that care for you."

Rouge just stood in the middle of everyone. She kept mostly to herself for a long time. Her relationships with people were always loose, so no one got too attached. Like with the fox boy. It started off sour, then she used his tails to cover herself until she got the chance to nab something to wear. She had planned to get him caught in the mix should her plan fall through. She never saw herself being this selfish until now that she's being embraced by a selfless family. She closed her eyes, trying not to show her tears.

--One week later--

Tails finished soldering his latest invention, the 'Memory Reforging Helmet'. He worked on a way to restore Rouge's memories to bring her back to reality. Luckily for him, the aging machine held onto them due to its large storage capacity. After building an adapter to back it up to a portable drive, he plugged it into the helmet. Considering the rest of his recent inventions, this one was done rather slowly.

"Man, if Eggman hadn't decided to attack that night, I could have still been in the groove I was on. Whatever. Now I just need to find Rouge. I hope Vanilla knows where she is." He recalled when she dragged her out of the mall by her wrist.

He quickly left his lab and flew with the helmet in his hands. Getting close to the Rabbit Residence, he spots Cream and Cheese picking flowers.

He lands in front of them and they exchange greetings. "So Cream, do you know what happened to the bat we saw a week ago?"

"You mean Miss Rouge? She's had been staying with us ever since."

He was a little surprised, but it made it easier for him. He walked through the front door and called for Rouge. When she was actually in full view, Tails saw that she was wearing.
122212122.title: Things that don't need saying.

1222122.content:
"Umm...Aren't you a bat? Don't you like the night?" Tails said with both sarcasm and true curiosity.

"Real funny. Why don't you try to find your way home in the middle of nowhere?" Rouge snaps back. "So like it or not, I'm pretty much stuck here."

"Great..." Tails sighed.

--Some Time Later--

Very reluctantly, Tails sets up a makeshift bed with a couch, blanket, and some pillows. Not the best bed in the world, but hey, it beats sleeping on his workbench. Meanwhile, Rouge just lounged around not really saying or doing anything. In truth, she seemed bored out of her mind. After a bit of agitated finger-tipping, she finally broke the silence.

"Hey Foxy, when are we going to eat?"

"Umm...I guess I could cook something right now." The fox opens the fridge and examines its contents. "Ah man. Sorry Rouge but I was creating so many machines I forgot to get some more food. All I have left is a chicken breast and some potatoes."

"Hmpf...Is that all? You make if sound like a bad thing." Rouge walked into the kitchen and grabs the ingredients. "I wouldn't want you to screw up this meal, so I'm going to take over from here."

Tails looked a bit confused, "You? I wouldn't picture you being able to cook or be a chef. You seem so...tomboyish." Remembering Rouge before the experiment, her consistent flirting, wordplay, and feminine charm wouldn't quite label her a 'tomboy'.

"Then I'll just have to prove to you just how wrong you are." Then without warning she punts him straight out of the kitchen and onto the sofa-bed. Taking a wild guess, Tails thinks he should just left her continue. Though this wasn't the first time a girl was fixing dinner for him, Rouge, kid or not, is not Vanilla or Cream.

As he tries to find something to occupy his time, he eyes the age device, door open and Rouge's old boots lying on the ground from when she tripped. Moving to the monitor, he looks up something that's been bothering him. Rouge can't recall most of her adult memories, so if she were to age up again, would she remember? After troubleshooting, he found the direct answer he was looking for.

Tails built the machine with a large amount of memory space and processing power, so he could return test subjects to their previous state. With it, memories. Once they were reverted back, they would be in the same state as they were before the test. Unfortunately, since an individual's brain packs so much information, only a single person's data could be stored. If someone else runs a test, Rouge's memories would be deleted and be unable to be recovered. Tails makes a mental note to see if he could make the storage device removable, and possibly portable.

"Hey, if you're done with that, I'm finished with the food." Rouge yells at him.

He cautiously crosses it front of the plate in fear of what monstrosity he would have to eat. When he opened his eyes, he was slightly taken aback. She cut the potatoes into wedges and evenly fried them. She baked the chicken to the point where it was cooked the whole way through. The entire plate was glistened with a light red liquid that was probably there to make it look fancy. Everything would have surprised him if he didn't see Rouge's plate next to his and how 'generously' she divided the chicken.

"Well, I admit it looks good."

"Enough talk. I want to see the look on your face when you eat your words." She said smiling.

He picks up a fork took the first bite out of the chicken. He honestly wanted to find some fault in it, but was seriously just a good piece of chicken. Rouge laughs at the face she wanted to see and started to eat the wedges.

"You did a good job Rouge, but what was this red sauce on the plate." he questioned.

"Oh, I don't know. I just grabbed it from the second fridge over there."

"Second fridge?" He looks in the direction she was pointing and his eyes instantly grew. He smacks the fork out of Rouge's hand yelling, "Stop! Don't eat anymore!"

"What's your problem?" she fires, incredibly ticked off.

"That's not a fridge! That's a cooling unit. I didn't just make machines, I made potions too. You put some kind of potion in the food and we can both be affected."

He rushes to the unit and immediately finds out the potion's effect.
1222122.title: Not the best sleepover

12221221.content:
"Uh oh! Why did it have to be that one?" Tails thought, cursing his luck.

"So, what was it?" Rouge asks, sounding more concerned than she intended.

"It was a vial of truth serum." He unconsciously blurts out. He could not help it after all.

With the truth floating in the air, Rouge planned to take full advantage. That was until she honestly said the first thing that came to her mind. "Man, don't scare me like that. For a second I thought you were going to say poison." Though not what she intended to say, she played along with it.

"Hey, I don't make poison, and even if I did, I would definitely prepare an antidote." He defends himself to protect his credibility before trialing off again, "But maybe I should have made an antidote to the serum."

"Well, this should be fun." She approaches Tails to corner him while trying to think of some juicy questions to ask him. "Maybe I get some dirt to blackmail you with."

"Yeah, well we both ate the chicken so you're under its effect too." he points out.

"I was hoping you wouldn't notice." she cringed as she showed him he was right. "It's no big deal. I just wouldn't say anything."

"Do you really think that's going to work?"

"No, not really." That time she slapped her mouth shut.

Apparently the potion more than effected the words they said as Tails could not stop himself from laughing.

Rouge exploded, "Hey, knock it off you jerk. I'm going to kick you so hard that's it's going to hurt." Silence rang throughout the room before Tails laughs even harder after the threat flopped. He soon stop when he fully though it through. It struck the same time Rouge's toe dig into his body.

He lands on his back before raising his index finger to confirm, "Just so you know, I'm not a fan of getting kicked."

"Sorry..." she growls at herself for destroying her own image. "That's it! I can't tell the truth if I'm the only one asking questions, right? So I'm not giving you a chance." She lifts him to get him at eye level. "Now why the heck did you make this inconvenient potion?"

"...I needed it just in case someone was hiding something from." he helplessly answered.

"Well that was disappointing. Well with that out of the way..."

Tails needed to interrupt her before she would ask anything that would be compromising. "Why did you come back here? You don't seem to be the kind of person to hate the night."

"You got on my nerves, but it looked like you got so many interesting toys here. I was going to wait until you fell asleep to take some, but now that you know that, I can't." she stomps on the ground.

"And another thing, why did you want to cook for me?"

"It was for you to trust me. Pretty pathetic isn't it?"

"Pathetic, how?"

"Stooping myself to such a level you'd expect a little girl to do, cooking...Ah! Tell me this wears off. Tell me it's right now, please!" She yells the last part.

"It's only supposed to last an hour, but it was split between the both of us, and most of it is still on the plates. So really, it shouldn't take that much longer."

"So last than thirty something minutes? That's too long! You know what, my cover was blown, I'm out for real this time." She turns towards the the door, pushing it open. Tails could tell she was serious this time because she was trying to snake her wings through the fabric so she can take flight.

Tails tried to stop her, "Wait! If you leave now I won't be able to fix you!"

............

"What was that?" Rouge said in monotone.

"I...kinda turned you into a kid. You're really supposed to be an adult." He hangs his head in shame. He tried to avoid revealing the truth but, in the end he revealed himself without even being asked a question.

Rouge takes a step back and pivots on her toe. With great speed, she pins the fox against the wall. "Why the heck would you do that?!" Her eyes were flaring with menace.

"Because you agreed to it." Now Rouge's expression was flabbergasted. "We agreed to do some experiments with you being the test subject. You know I'm not lying right now."

"......Well...Sounds like I was being stupid." She lets go of Tails and backs off.

"That was the thing I didn't want to tell you the most. Now that you know I don't see a reason to keep this up."

"Are you going to turn me back?"

"Yeah, it's the right thing to do." He boots up the aging machine to return Rouge to normal. Rouge stares first at the machine, then the boots, then the breastplate before it all started making sense.

"So what was I like as a grown up?" she asked with wonder.

"Seductive, sly, greedy. If there was something you wanted, you would stop it nothing to get it."

"Really...?"

"C'mon. When you step inside, you'll also get your memories back."

Rouge was lost in thought before saying...
12221221.title: Truth or...Truth, I Guess...

122212211.content:
"Why?" Tails responded to the unexpected question.

"I-It's just that I'm a little uncomfortable about everything right now. The way you put makes it seem a bit scary. Damn potion! I hate not being able to keep secrets!" Rouge shouted the last bit with her arms flailing in the air.

The boy chuckled at the bat's misfortune, only for her to raise her kicking foot to immediately get him to pipe down. "Sorry, you know I can't help it. ahem...So what are you even going to do now that you're choosing to still be a kid?"

"Well, if I change and get my old memories back, then what would happen to the ones I have now?" She asked with her head slightly tilted.

"I...don't know...You might keep them or they could be pretty much deleted." Tails guessed.

"In that case, if they do, I got to make some enjoyable ones." Rouge crossed her arms.

"Wait, is that really necessary? We could just see if they do right now and..."

"I don't want to say anything else embarrassing again, so I'm going to bed." She turned and headed towards Tails' bedroom. Before Tails could stop her, the door was slammed shut and locked.

While everything was under control, Tails couldn't really do anything at the moment. Despite his better judgment telling not to leave her alone, he left to get more food for breakfast.

--Morning--

Rouge was a bit a mess when she woke up. She was never a morning person, probably due to her being a bat. Her eyes fully adjusted to the light after a yawn and saw the different environment. Remembering what happened, she quickly checked one thing before anything else. She grabbed one of her wings and said aloud, "This is a wing of...a wombat..!" It was stupid, but now she knows she can lie again. She stood up and heard her stomach growl. "Right, I cooked dinner last night and it ended up on the floor." she grumbled.

She walked out of the room and immediately saw Tails sleeping on the cough. What was more surprising was the stockpile of food on the center in paper bags. Paying no mind to it, she opened the fridge to see if he got milk and was more astonished that it was completely filled as well. Seemed like he made several trips before tiring himself out.

She eyed him snoozing away with a glass of milk in her hand. It didn't escape her that he purposefully bought too much food for her. She caught herself staring before shaking her head. "Whatever, after what he did, he owes me breakfast, at least. Hey Tailboy, rise and shine." She dug her toe into his sleeping face.

Tails got startled awake and pushed her foot aside. "I'm up! I'm up already! Geez..."

"Good, cause I'm starving." With that, Tails was already pressured into cooking breakfast. Well, he 'prepared' it instead of cooked it as he just poured two bowls of cereal and cut an orange in half. Rouge teased Tails' simplicity. "So the genius that can make machines and potions doesn't know how to cook? That's kinda sad."

"Shut it! I just didn't want to wait for too long." He retorted.

There was no further conversation as the two ate. It was a little weird to Tails that while she teased the meal, she was downing it as if someone else was going to take it. When she finished drinking directly from the bowl, she let out a sigh and licked the corners of her mouth. Tails stated, "This is really strange."

"Hmm..?"

"You know you're supposed to be an adult, and yet you chose to stay a kid. Why is that?"

Rouge turned up her nose, "...I-If I wanted to answer that, I would have told you last night thanks to that stupid truth serum."

It was obvious she's trying to avoid talking about it, but would knowing actually help?
122212211.title: Who Wants to Grow Up Anyway?

12221222.content:
"Ah!" He nearly screams.

"Well, what was it?" Rouge asked.

"You...soaked the food with an attraction potion."

"Wha...what the heck is an attraction potion?"

"It's like a love potion but weaker. It makes the drinker become more attracted to the first person they see." After he was finished explaining, the two were obviously staring at each other. They hastily spin one-hundred eighty degrees, breaking all eye contact.

"Tell me something good about this or else you and my heel get real attracted each other." Rouge threatened.

It worked as Tails frantically thought of a response. "Huh?! Um um um...Well the potion is temporary, so if we wait it out, we should be fine."

"How long?"

"Maybe..." He took into account that to potion was split in two and was mostly on the plates. "...ten minutes."

Rouge sighs and sits down on the ground. "That's not too bad, I guess. All I have to do is not look at you, right?"

Tails takes a seat as well. "Don't make it sound like that is the bad thing here."

A few minutes passed in utter silence. It was nerve wracking that doing nothing was to best thing to do. Rouge spoke up, "If I had to guess, I'd say you got your eye on someone."

Tails face heated up at her remark. "W-what are you trying to say?!"

"You made a potion that make people like someone else. It would make sense if you were to use it on the special someone to like you back." She smiles, though it was invisible to Tails.

Tails facepalms, clearly wanting to change the subject, "Why does that even matter to you?" He place his hand back down and unexpectedly touch something. He turns his body to look when his shoulder touched something else. Truly curious now, he looks behind to see that the gap separating him and Rouge was gone as he saw her looking back.

"Ah! What are you doing!" Rouge screams, averting her eyes.

"Me?! We were a few feet away! I shouldn't have bumped into you." He defends himself by covering his eyes with his arm.

"You must've scooted closer to me. You're already losing to the potion."

"No, this isn't working." Tails ran to his bedroom and slammed the door to separate himself from Rouge. He opened the door slightly to yell back, "Don't steal anything!" then locked the door behind him. In solitude, Tails forced himself to calm down. His heart was beating quickly, which he hoped came from the sudden shock and yelling. Even though he was just sitting down, he needed to catch his breath. The most troubling thing was he kept seeing the image of Rouge staring back at him. "If this is happening just from a taste, drinking the entire vial could drive the drinker crazy." he concluded. Faintly, he could hear something happening in the other room. He couldn't immediately tell, but it sounded like a piece of metal hitting something. He thought of what it might be before his face pales. No, she isn't...

Tails opened the door and confirmed his supposition. Rouge was holding a fork with the chicken in one hand, potato wedges in the other. She ate without any restraint. Her eyes wandered over in Tails direction and noticed him.

Her mouth was still full as she indifferently said, "Hey...You're back."

"What are you doing?! You can't eat that!" Tails yelled has if she lost it.

"Why not? Yeah the fork was on the floor but I cleaned it." She showed the fork has if it was nothing.

"That's not it! If you waited a bit longer, you would been fine!" He explained with great concern.

"Yeah, I know, but I'm still hungry and this is the only food here. I still going to eat so the potion would have done its thing anyway."

It wasn't the worst argument, but the fox knew to result. "Arg...You do know that when mine wears off, yours is still going to be a problem?"

"True, but if you eat yours too, then it won't be one-sided." The witty bat countered.

Tails gave a slight yip. He did not like where this was going.

Rouge showed a smile different from her former seductive tone. It was more friendly. "What could happen? After all, you liked the cooking, didn't you"

Seeing that smile made Tails' heart beat faster. "...Even if I wanted to, you're eating from my plate."

"True." She stuck the fork into a wedge from her plate. "Then take one from mine."

"She planned this out! That's cheating!" Tails screamed internally.

"Please, it would be mean to deny my cooking." She pouted.

Tails was torn. It wouldn't be fair for him to stay away from Rouge when she was going to be the only one under effect. At the same time, if he went along with it, he didn't know how far it would take him.
12221222.title: Potion of Attraction

12223.content: Tails decides to make her younger than eight, but how much younger?

Sure enough, once the machine started to process on rouge, the door opened as smoke cleared out, the inside revealed but nothing but a little of clothes and naked little bad under them, who was a toddler, and was about 2-3 years of age.

Tails: Alright, it worked.

Tails walked over to rouge to see if she was okay.

Tails: Rouge, are you okay?

Rouge just giggles as she tried to grab his tails.

Tails picks up rouge from her now large clothes and holds her out to his face.

Tails: Hehe, you know, you look cute as a baby.

Then...

As Tails set rouge back into oversized clothes, Rouge suddenly had an urge to poop as she gave a uncomfortable look on her face.

"What's wrong Rouge?" Asked Tails, noticing this.

"Potty!" Said Rouge.

12223211222.content:
"'Gotta make poopy." said Rouge as she farted. "Don't worry, I'll get you to the potty. Just hold it in a little longer. You can hold it!"

When they got to the bathroom, Tails sat her on the toilet just in time.
12223211222.title: There was still time to take her to the bathroom.

choices: Rouge remembers everything but enjoys it and wants to take it further.
She remembers and likes this but wants to be turned back to normal for now.
122232112221.content:
When Rouge finished‚ she farted to make sure she was empty.

‘Poot’. “I done pooping mista.” “Good girl, and my name is Tails. But the toilet's too big for you, I'll have to get you a potty chair and some pull-ups training pants. “Yay, potty training, potty training! I gonna be potty trained! I so happy I could tinkle and poot”

As soon as Rouge said that, she peed in the toilet. ‘Hisssss'. Followed by a fart. ‘pffffft' “Oopsie, ‘scue me." She said as she fanned the fart with her left wing while blushing and smiling.
122232112221.title: Get Rouge a potty chair and raise her as his own.

1222322.content: Tails figured that if he turned Rouge into a baby, then he wouldn't have to turn two Chaos Emeralds over to her, as she wouldn't have any use for them. But maybe he could turn her into a newborn to be extra sure...
1222322.title: Baby/ Newborn

choices: Take care of her/ Have someone else do it
12223222.content:
Tails set the device to newborn & turned mental regression on, and when Rouge was searching his lab to find something to try out, he fired it at her. Rouge reacted in shock to this, but before she could say anything, she began getting younger, shrinking down until her clothes collapsed into a pile with her inside it.

Walking over to where Rouge's clothes lay, Tails dug through & picked out a tiny naked baby bat with wide eyes & tiny wings that looked like it wasn't born too long ago. Then he smirked in a sly manner before saying, "Did you honestly think I'd hand over two Chaos Emeralds to the likes of you? Now look where your greed has gotten you: helpless in my arms." Rouge said nothing, as she didn't understand him, nor did she have any memory of her former life.

Tails put a diaper on Rouge & placed her in a nearby crib (both of which he kept on hand in case he regressed someone else he used it on to that state), then he took one of the emeralds he had on hand, tied a thick cord around it, & hung it on the crib to let it dangle in front of Rouge. "If you can get it, it's yours," he told her. He then sat by to observe her, knowing that she probably wouldn't be able to get it.

Rouge was fascinated at the strange object that dangled over her. She had no idea what it was, but she wanted to touch it. She kept on reaching out to it & kicking her legs, but she was unable to get up to it. She could no longer stand or even sit up. So she lay there, making cute little baby moans & coos. She kept on trying to grab it, but the results were the same.

Tails stared at the baby as she was reaching for the emerald. "She's pretty cute," he thought to himself. "It amazes me to think that this tiny baby would grow up to be the treasure hunter/ jewel thief/ part-time spy she is today." After that, he was wondering about something. He wasn't an expert on raising children, but he figured that he or someone else would have to raise her again, since she was currently unable to do anything on her own. But then he also considered possibly doing another experiment on her, like make her another age or trying out another invention. He sat there pondering what he should do.
12223222.title: Newborn

choices: "Maybe Cream and Vanilla will do it."
122232221.content: He then thought it wouldn't be too hard to raise a child, or he can find someone else to do it. He then said...
122232221.title: Take care of her/ Have someone else do it

1222322211.content:
"I'll raise her as my own," Tails proclaimed. "Since you are just a baby, and I could raise you not to be a thief."

Tails wiggled his finger over Rouge's head, who smiled and began to grab at it. He thought about it, and began to wonder if he could do it alone, or would he need help.
1222322211.title: "I'll raise her as my own."

12223222112.content:
Tails need to to find someone to help raise Rouge.

12223222112.title: Find someone to help

123132222212211.content:
Tails watched in a combination of horror and fascination as Rouge shuffled out of the machine. "Ugh... Tails? Is that you? I don't feel so good..." Tails stared at her blankly, not quite understanding what had just happened. "Tails? What's going on? You look like you've seen a ghost. And how come I feel so weird?"

Tails squinted at Rouge as though he didn't quite believe what he was seeing. Her skin had gone pale, and her the whites of her eyes were a sickly yellow. "Umm... I'm not sure how to put this gently Rouge, but, um... You're dead." Rouge blinked at him. "What? No, no, that can't be right. If I was dead I wouldn't be walking around!" Suddenly, Rouge slipped on the floor. The force of the impact knocked her head off, but she hadn't realized that yet as her head had landed looking away from her body. As her body stood back up, she began to worry when her head's perspective didn't shift. "Um, Tails? What's going on?"

Tails picked up her head and turned her to face her now headless body. "I told you. You're dead." Rouge was stunned. "No! No, I can't be dead! This just has to be a side efffect of your machine! Right?" "Here, I can prove it to you." He walked up to her body and pressed her head against her own chest. There was no heartbeat. "See?" Tails handed Rouge her head. She slowly held herself up to examine her neck stump, and was able to see all the muscles and spinal bones and everything. "I-I just can't believe it..." Rouge mumbled, before breaking down in tears.

Tails gave her rotting flesh a gentle reassuring hug. "There there Rouge. I know this must come as something as a shock, but look on the bright side. At least you're still ambulatory, right? Most corpses aren't nearly so lucky as you are." Rouge sniffed, then smiled weakly. "Y-yeah, I guess that's true. Um, Tails?" "Yes Rouge?"

When she wakes up she finds herself in what looks to be an operating room. She tries to get up but can't. Her body won't respond. Then she looks down and sees that this because she has no body. She takes the first course of action that pops into her mind and screams. Loudly.

"So, you're going to attach me to a robot body?" she asks hopefully. "Almost." he replies, while picking her up with both hands. "But not quite. I'd have to be pretty crazy to attach you to a robot body while you're in your current state of mind. On a related note, Would you like to meet my new assistant?" He turns around and Rouge sees a very familiar figure. It's her body! But something is very wrong. An exact duplicate of her head is sitting on her shoulders! "WHAT DID YOU DO!?!?!?" Rouge screams. Tails is about to reply, but Rouge's new double beats him to it. "My name is Cynthea. I am an android duplicate of your head. 12533222122211.content:
Tails lead rouge to what looked like a modified electric chair. "What is this?" She asked. "This is something a created for the army." Said Tails. "It's supposed to give people psychic powers, to create a breed of Psychic Soldiers. But I haven't tried it yet."

"So, if I test this machine, I'll be able to read minds and stuff?" Asked Rouge. "Yep." Said Tails. "Alright! Let's do it!" Said Rouge. She sat in the chair, and Tails strapped her arms and legs in. Then he put on a helmet with a long cord leading into the top of the chair.

"Ready?" He asked. "Do it!" Tails flipped the switch to the chair, and Rouge felt a massive shock go through her body. "Aaaaaaaaaaaaaaahhhhhhhh!" She yelled as the surge altered her brain.

Finally the shock stopped. Rouge was smoking a little, and she had a major headache. "Are you okay?" Tails asked her. She slowly lifted her head up. "I feel like I jumped off the Empire State Building and landed on my head." She said with a groan. Tails helped her out of the chair.

She stood in front of him, head in her hands. "Now Rouge, I'm going to think of something and I want you to tell me what I'm thinking. "Rouge stared at him, trying to see into his mind. Suddenly she saw a picture in her mind of an apple. "An apple." She said.

"Good. What now?" "A chicken." "And now?" This time she was disgusted by what she saw. "Tails you pervert!" "Just wanted to make sure you were paying attention." He said laughing.

He held up a deck of cards and picked one. "What card am I holding?" "Three of clubs." "And now?" "Queen of hearts." "Now?" "Rules for stud poker."

He held up a marble. "Make this marble leave my hand." Rouge stared at the marble. She concentrated hard on it. little by little, the marble rose out of Tail's palm. It hovered in the air, then she made it fly around the room. "Well" She said. "Looks like your machine works. But, I wonder......."

Tails stares at her. He didn't really know what he had expected, but it certainly wasn't this. A part of Rouge's mind was asking him if he could take it with him when he left? "I don't know if I can do that Love," Tails informed her. "The machine I used to get here wasn't really designed to allow things that started in the mind, like you, to leave. Just for people who were already outside the mind. Plus, taking you out of Rouge's mind could have some serious affects on her mental state." "I don't care," Love told him. "Every time she meets someone nice, Rouge represses me because she's afraid of getting close to people. I only get used when she thinks of jewels, and even then Greed does most of the work. It's sooo boooring. I figure, since she doesn't use me much anyway, she won't miss me when I'm gone. So what do you say? If I take you to her control center, will you take me with you when you decide to leave?"

Tails thought about it. On the one hand, he really wanted to see this control room. On the other hand, taking Love with him when he left would, in all probability, remove Rouge's capacity to feel love. On the other other hand, it might be an interesting experiment in and of itself to see what happened when you removed pieces of someone's personality. But then again, the long term consequences might be terrible. Then there was the fact that Love wanted to leave.

Rouge suddenly had a better idea. She let go of Tails and turned him to face her. "How about this?" She said. "I won't punish you if you give me those chaos emeralds right now. I'll even go get someone else to be your lab rat, as long as I get to watch."


Tails immediately agreed. "Sounds fine to me." He went to his lab and into his vault. He came back carrying two cahos emeralds in his hands. Rouge took them from him and placed them in her cleavage for safekeeping.


"Now, wait here." She said as she flew off. Tails waited around his house for her to return for about two hours, still she didn't return. "Why that sneaky little..........I bet she just flew home and wasn't going to find anyone to test my inventions on in the first place."



Just then there was a knocking at his door. He answered it and there stood Rouge with her chosen victim. Who was it?

1322.content:
Grabbing a small scanner and giving Blaze a quick check with it, it wasn't hard to tell why she was out cold. Rouge had drugged her, with a large enough dose to keep her out for hours.

"Drat." tails grumbled, knowing that that would rule out almost all of his experiments. He needed a test subject that was conscious and alert. even if he were to get the sedative out of her blood she would still be groggy for a while after. Then it hit him, he had inventions that could solve this problem for him.

He could use the reverse-engineered roboticizer he had. unlike Robotnik's his could target specific body parts, and a mechanical brain wouldn't be subject to the effects of sedatives.

Perhaps he could use that nanotech serum he had concocted, the one meant to allow someone to function while missing body parts like their brain, heart, lungs, or whatever else. that would take over brain function, waking her up, and it would let him try some of the experiments that involved taking her apart.

Of course he could focus on experiments that didn't need a conscious test subject, but he didn't have many of those. probably only two or three.

The device shatters and releases a blinding light! Tails raises his arms in front of his face in a futile effort to protect himself. The light brightens and...

Tails blinks. He's standing in his lab, next to an unconcious Blaze, about to inject her with a fluid that will allow her to be taken apart while remaining alive (and not robotocize her in any way, he made absolutely certain of that).

"I just had the weirdest feeling of deja vu..." he mutters to himself. He glances to his right and sees an experimental and highly temperamental chronol distortion device balanced precariously at the edge of the surgery table. After moving it to a safer place, he returns to Blaze's unconscious form. "Right then. let's take you apart, shall we?" He says as he injects her with the nano bots.

After the microscopic robots are ready to carry out their task, Tails begins the process of disassembling the still living Blaze. He carefully slices her head open, and levers her brain out onto a nearby tray. Realizing that she may not be happy with her situation, he wisely chooses to engage the tables restraints before continuing.

"-And that's why I'll never associate myself with janitors closets anymore." finished Rouge. "That was the most epic story I have ever heard in my entire life." Spoke an amazed Tails, "If I for any reason only heard the end of it: I'd just go kill myself!" "I still want to know how Eggman got those Clown Stripper Robots." Said Vanilla as she sipped some of her tea, "Heck, I didn't even know there were such things as Clown Stripper Robots." "The unsung heroes of the Big-Top." "Indeed Rouge." Replied Tails, "But seriously though, why did you bring me these two to test on, I like Cream and Vanilla." "Well Tails I just want to..."

13412.content:
Tails smiled as an idea crossed his mind.

"Alright Rouge, I need you to hold her still for me while I use this." he said cooly. Rouge sighed and held Sally's shoulders as Tails aimed the gun.

A ray fired from it, hitting both the unconscious Sally and Rouge. As the ray receded, Rouge stood there in confusion.

"Ugh... Tails? What... what am I doing here?" she asked

"Well... do you remember the emerald?"

"Emerald what... what emerald?" she replied

"The one from helping me."

"Helping you..?"

Tails was overjoyed! It seemed Rouge had not only forgotten the fake emerald, but had forgotten the previous day of experiments as well.

"Rouge. You agreed to help me with my experiments in exchange for a chaos emerald. And Sally agreed because... well because she's nice"

"Hm... that... makes sense... so what are we testing?" she asked.

Tails then...

info.brief_description: The sequel to the hit story!
info.description:
Well, my Rouge the lab rat story is doing so good, I've decided to make a sequel! I'm sure at least some of you were hoping for this.

The story takes place after a certain story line in the first one. Where Tails gives Rouge a fake chaos emerald. Same rules as the first one.

Also, You can put in the same inventions from the first one, just don't use the same storylines. Make something new up!

Well, that's pretty much it. Have fun!

UPDATE! I have decided to put in an option for Tails to test his inventions on another Sonic girl. There is to be no experiments on any male Sonic character except for Tails.

Originally by Anonymous One http://www.writing.com/main/portfolio/view/ironman16
